name: ASR
authentication: Requires a CLARIN Service Provider Federation account, provided by many universities and institutions.
description: This service sends the input speech signal(s) to a third-party automatic speech recognition service (option 'ASR Service') and returns the result of the recognition (a chain of recognized words) as an orthographic transcription in various formats. To get started simply drop a media file with speech to the drop area or click in the drop area for an upload dialog, select the language and output format and press the 'Run Web Service' button.
